question: Trump's July 11 sentencing pushed back?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump's sentencing in "The State of New York vs. Donald Trump" is rescheduled for a date after July 11, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official governmental information, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Iga Swiatek win Wimbledon Women's?
description:
The market will resolve to “Yes” if Iga Swiatek wins the 2024 Wimbledon Championships Women's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If at any point it becomes impossible for this player to win in Women's Singles based on the rules of The Championships, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will another player win Wimbledon Women's?
description:
The market will resolve to “Yes” if any player other than Iga Swiatek, Aryna Sabalenka, Elena Rybakina, Coco Gauff, Ons Jabeur, Petra Kvitova, Naomi Osaka, Emma Raducanu, Jessica Pegula, or Mirra Andreeva wins the 2024 Wimbledon Championships Men's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If no winner of the 2024 Wimbledon Championships Men's Singles tournament is declared by July 31, 2024, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Beryl hit US as a hurricane?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Hurricane system currently named 'Beryl' makes landfall in the conterminous US as Hurricane, as reported in official National Hurricane Center advisories (https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/text/refresh/MIATCPAT2+shtml/020248.shtml). If Beryl does not hit the United States by July 8, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or otherwise dissipates before that date, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, a hurricane landfall is said to occur when a hurricane's surface center intersects with the coastline, as described at https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/aboutgloss.shtml#LANDFALL, and the NHC officially reports that the storm has maximum sustained winds of 74 mph or higher at the time of landfall.

This market will resolve based on an initial advisory released by the NHC that Beryl has made landfall within the conterminous United States within the market timeframe regardless of any later retraction or analysis that may contradict the initial announcement.

events.title: Will Beryl hit US as a hurricane?

question: Biden court packing?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if US President Joe Biden nominates any US Supreme Court Justices intended to increase the total number of justices beyond 9 by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

If Biden ceases to be POTUS before this market's expiration date, it may immediately resolve to "No". The transfer of power to an "acting president" will not count toward the resolution of this market (e.g. the vice president becomes acting president for the duration of a surgery).

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the US Government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Biden court packing?
events.description:

question: Biden drops out by July 12?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if President Joe Biden officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from the 2024 US presidential race by July 12, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No". 

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent Joe Biden from continuing the race, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Joe Biden or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Biden say "Kamala" or "Harris" in ABC interview?
description:
Joe Biden is scheduled to interview with ABC . This market refers to anything Biden says during initial airing of the interview, currently scheduled for Friday, July 5. Further airings of the interview after the initial release which include new footage will not be considered for this market. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden says "Kamala" or "Harris". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If no Biden-ABC interview is publicly released by July 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "Kamala" or "Harris" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to the person Kamala Harris.

The resolution source is the first released video of the interview.

events.title: What will Biden say in ABC interview?
